CustomField.formula: AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Cancelled-Error")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Campaign Ended")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Campaign Override")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Open Opportunity Found")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Lockout Prospect Ownership Found")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Touchpoint Expired")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Ongoing Criteria Changed")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Error: Already in Cadence")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Error: Cadence Type Already Exists")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Error: Do Not Contact")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Error: Generic Exception")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Error: Invalid Object Id")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Error: Target Type Already Exists")) ,NOT( ISPICKVAL(CloseReason__c, "Error: No Cadence Selected")) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is this record closed and does the close reason indicate it was closed by the rep?
CustomField.label: Rep Closed?
